title: Pool Management Support
description_html: At Van Oord, our Project Office in Gorinchem plays a key role in deploying the right people with the right resources to projects and vessels worldwide. As Pool Management Support, you form a vital link between HR, operations and our people. You’ll join a team that works across departments and time zones to make sure everything runs smoothly behind the scenes — so that others can thrive offshore.
description_text: At Van Oord, our Project Office in Gorinchem plays a key role in deploying the right people with the right resources to projects and vessels worldwide. As Pool Management Support, you form a vital link between HR, operations and our people. You’ll join a team that works across departments and time zones to make sure everything runs smoothly behind the scenes — so that others can thrive offshore.

title: Project Secretary
description_html: As Project Secretary at our Offshore Energy Project Secretariat in Gorinchem, you will work side by side with our Project Directors and Project Managers, as well as supporting the daily flow of office life. From stakeholder communication and meeting organization to lunch arrangements and event support — your work ensures our team operates like a well-oiled machine. You'll also be closely involved in managing facilities, supplies, and even the layout of our office space.
description_text: As Project Secretary at our Offshore Energy Project Secretariat in Gorinchem, you will work side by side with our Project Directors and Project Managers, as well as supporting the daily flow of office life. From stakeholder communication and meeting organization to lunch arrangements and event support — your work ensures our team operates like a well-oiled machine. You'll also be closely involved in managing facilities, supplies, and even the layout of our office space.

title: Pool Manager QHSE
description_html:
This position is a replacement. To ensure continuity, we aim for a warm handover, with the new Pool Manager being onboarded by the current role holder until the end of May.
Because this handover period is time sensitive, we are looking for someone who is available at short notice. Once a suitable candidate has been found, the vacancy will be closed immediately, so early applications are encouraged.

As a Pool Manager within the QHSE, you act as the bridge between project needs and talent capabilities. You connect the Business Units Offshore Energy & Dredging and Infra, ongoing projects, and Pool staff to ensure the right people are at the right place at the right time. You balance operational priorities with a people-first mindset, using your experience to make decisions that reflect Van Oord’s values and long-term vision.

You maintain a full overview of all skills and competencies within your pool and across Operations, ensuring that every staffing choice supports project excellence and growth. You are the conversational partner for your pool when it comes to development, issues and other important topics.

title: Project Finance Administrator
description_html: As Project Finance Administrator, you are at the heart of our projects in the Netherlands. You support a wide range of small and medium-sized projects and ensure that financial information is clear, reliable and ready for action. You work within the Area Netherlands organisation and connect project teams with finance, management and shared services. In this role, accuracy and insight go hand in hand.

title: Junior Surveyor
description_html: You contribute to safe and (cost) efficient project execution. Collect, organize and store survey data, reporting reliable and valid data and communicate possible deviations to the project organization. Perform measurements and surveys to support and optimize processes in project execution, in line with contractual agreements and survey quality and safety standards.

Perform measurements and surveys to support and optimize processes in project execution, in line with contractual agreements and survey quality and safety standards.

title: Senior Production Engineering
description_html:
As a Senior Production Engineer Foundations & WTGs You will work in either tendering or in the project support team.

 

In tendering you guide the production engineers of two tender teams and are end responsible for the production results. Together you create the production estimates which forms the basis for the execution schedule and cost estimate. Trade-offs are prepared in collaboration with the tender team to determine the most competitive work method (e.g. feeder vs shuttle). The chosen solution is detailed by aligning with different stakeholders (Metocean, Operations, Geotech, hydrodynamic).

In addition you will drive improvements in our tendering approach.  

 

During the execution phase the production support department (PSD) is responsible for updating the production estimates and prepare alternative work methods to improve the execution method. Production dashboards are prepared to provide insight into asset performance. If deviations between the estimate and actuals are observed the rootcause is identified. The production department performs vessel visits to support this process.
description_text:
As a Senior Production Engineer Foundations & WTGs You will work in either tendering or in the project support team.
In tendering you guide the production engineers of two tender teams and are end responsible for the production results. Together you create the production estimates which forms the basis for the execution schedule and cost estimate. Trade-offs are prepared in collaboration with the tender team to determine the most competitive work method (e.g. feeder vs shuttle). The chosen solution is detailed by aligning with different stakeholders (Metocean, Operations, Geotech, hydrodynamic).
In addition you will drive improvements in our tendering approach.
During the execution phase the production support department (PSD) is responsible for updating the production estimates and prepare alternative work methods to improve the execution method. Production dashboards are prepared to provide insight into asset performance. If deviations between the estimate and actuals are observed the rootcause is identified. The production department performs vessel visits to support this process.

title: Technical Superintendent
description_html: To expand our Ship Management Department, based in Rotterdam, we are looking for a fulltime Technical Superintendent. In this role you ensure that our vessels are in excellent technical state, so they operate effectively worldwide. You will manage several vessels and give technical advice and support to the technical crew members on board.
description_text:
To expand our Ship Management Department, based in Rotterdam, we are looking for a fulltime Technical S
uperintendent.
In this role you ensure that our vessels are in excellent technical state, so they operate effectively worldwide. You will manage several vessels and give technical advice and support to the technical crew members on board.

title: Central Parts Specialist
description_html: As Central Parts Specialist, you’ll play a key role in managing and improving our part data within IFS. You’ll be at the centre of the CPM team, contributing to the development of standardised processes and ensuring consistent, high-quality part data across the organisation.
description_text: As Central Parts Specialist, you’ll play a key role in managing and improving our part data within IFS. You’ll be at the centre of the CPM team, contributing to the development of standardised processes and ensuring consistent, high-quality part data across the organisation.

title: Chief Officer SRI DPO
description_html: As Chief Officer at Van Oord, you will work for a family-owned business that prioritizes people and safety. You will be working on international projects with a 5-weeks-on and 5-weeks-off sailing schedule. The offshore fleet consists of subsea rock installation vessels, cable-laying vessels, and wind-installation jack-up vessels. In this role, you will independently lead offshore projects and collaborate with project management, client representatives, and your team.
description_text: As Chief Officer at Van Oord, you will work for a family-owned business that prioritizes people and safety. You will be working on international projects with a 5-weeks-on and 5-weeks-off sailing schedule. The offshore fleet consists of subsea rock installation vessels, cable-laying vessels, and wind-installation jack-up vessels. In this role, you will independently lead offshore projects and collaborate with project management, client representatives, and your team.

title: Officer Expat Desk
description_html: Every year, Van Oord employees set out on international assignments that span continents and cultures. These journeys come with important administrative steps. As Officer Expat Desk, you manage this process with precision and attention to people. From contracts to assignment conditions and documentation, you ensure everything is aligned, compliant and well-organised throughout the full assignment lifecycle..
description_text:

From contracts to assignment conditions and documentation, you ensure everything is aligned, compliant and well-organised throughout the full assignment lifecycle.
.

title: Trainee CAD Engineer
description_html:
Due to the expansion of our company, we require a Trainee CAD Engineer based at our office in Stokesley, North Yorkshire.

As Trainee CAD Engineer you shall build on current experience to develop a skillset that can provide detailed 2D and 3D drawings for all phases of our offshore wind installation projects. You will work under supervision and be given guidance on how to produce deck layouts, lifting arrangements, rigging arrangements, jack up position offshore drawings and storyboards.

You will show an aptitude to develop an engineering thought process, and explore engineering solutions with minimal supervision. You will build and develop professional relationships with team members, and gain an understanding of the requirements and deliver in a timely manner.
description_text:

You will show an aptitude to develop an engineering thought process, and explore engineering solutions with minimal supervision. You will build and develop professional relationships with team members, and gain an understanding of the requirements and deliver in a timely manner.

title: QHSE Coordinator Supply Chain Management
description_html: The QHSE Coordinator Supply Chain Management is a new role that will develop within the QHSE Offshore Energy (OFE) team and will focus on strengthening the cooperation with our suppliers and subcontractors, from a QHSE perspective.
description_text: The QHSE Coordinator Supply Chain Management is a new role that will develop within the QHSE Offshore Energy (OFE) team and will focus on strengthening the cooperation with our suppliers and subcontractors, from a QHSE perspective.

title: Contract Manager
description_html:
You are the connecting link between Van Oord and our manpower suppliers. Once a contract is in place, you step in. Your job is to ensure the agreements we make are implemented smoothly and deliver value. You work closely with our Category Managers for Temp Labour, Recruitment, Learning & Development, Engineering and Professional Services, and help shape a strong performance culture across our supplier base. You will:

  • Serve as the point of contact for internal stakeholders on contractual matters and act as a “middleman” ensuring timely review, approval and reconciliation of variations
  • Support Category Managers in negotiation and contract drafting
  • Provide contract visibility and awareness to internal teams
  • Ensure contract close-out, extension or renewal and guide implementation
  • Contribute to change management of processes and supplier improvement plans
description_text:
You are the connecting link between Van Oord and our manpower suppliers. Once a contract is in place, you step in. Your job is to ensure the agreements we make are implemented smoothly and deliver value. You work closely with our Category Managers for Temp Labour, Recruitment, Learning & Development, Engineering and Professional Services, and help shape a strong performance culture across our supplier base. Support Category Managers in negotiation and contract drafting
Provide contract visibility and awareness to internal teams
Ensure contract close-out, extension or renewal and guide implementation
Contribute to change management of processes and supplier improvement plans

title: Engineering Manager Capital Dredging
description_html: As Engineering Manager in the Product Line Capital Dredging you are the owner of the technical solution throughout all stages of the project. You will manage engineering activities in tendering and execution, provide clear communication across teams and connect all multidisciplinary and technical aspects of work packages. With your experience you guide teams to deliver safe and effective solutions that contribute to profitable projects in line with Van Oord strategic objectives.
description_text: As Engineering Manager in the Product Line Capital Dredging you are the owner of the technical solution throughout all stages of the project. You will manage engineering activities in tendering and execution, provide clear communication across teams and connect all multidisciplinary and technical aspects of work packages. With your experience you guide teams to deliver safe and effective solutions that contribute to profitable projects in line with Van Oord strategic objectives.

title: FP&A Consultant
description_html:
Do you want to make an impact on strategic decision-making in an international, project-driven environment? For the Finance & Control department in Rotterdam, we are looking for an FP&A Consultant to strengthen the FP&A team. In this role, you act as a strategic advisor and trusted business partner to (senior) management. You deliver sharp, data-driven financial insights that guide decision-making and key strategic processes such as the Annual Plan and Long Term Plan.

In addition, you play an active role in further digitalising and professionalising financial processes and data analytics. In this role, you report to the Manager FP&A.

title: Senior Field Engineer
description_html:
As a "Senior Field Engineer you will be part of the Installation engineering Team based in UAE Office and work in direct cooperation with HQ in the Netherlands to deliver various high value solutions for our projects and organization. The Field Engineer collaborates with E&E Engineering, Project Management and Operations to ensure that the installation aspect and work methods can be safely and reliably executed with the installation vessel(s). In this role the Field Engineer ensures that the Offshore Construction Manager and/or discipline engineers and Subject Matter Experts (such as Welding, NDT, Coating, Survey, Diving are consulted, starting with early onshore preparations and engineering and continues until completion of installation. 


During offshore installation, the Field Engineer supports the OCM with any and all onboard engineering aspects and facilitates communications with Engineering as and when required by the OCM.
description_text:

In this role the Field Engineer ensures that the Offshore Construction Manager and/or discipline engineers and Subject Matter Experts (such as Welding, NDT, Coating, Survey, Diving are consulted, starting with early onshore preparations and engineering and continues until completion of installation.
During offshore installation, the Field Engineer supports the OCM with any and all onboard engineering aspects and facilitates communications with Engineering as and when required by the OCM.

title: Project HSE manager
description_html: As a project HSE Manager at Van Oord you will work on different project locations (rotation) to make sure that all the safety policies are adhered by your colleagues, contractors and third parties. You are creative in coming up with solutions that are both efficient and safe. It is up to you to take the lead in implementing safety and environmental excellence.
description_text: As a project HSE Manager at Van Oord you will work on different project locations (rotation) to make sure that all the safety policies are adhered by your colleagues, contractors and third parties. You are creative in coming up with solutions that are both efficient and safe. It is up to you to take the lead in implementing safety and environmental excellence.

title: Project Quality Manager
description_html:
As Project Quality Manager, you are responsible for all quality-related aspects within your project. You report to the Project Director and are part of the Project Management Team. You are the go-to person for quality matters for the project team, the client, and subcontractors.

Your responsibilities include:

  • Leading the project quality team and coordinating all QA/QC activities.
  • Ensuring compliance with Van Oord Management System, ISO standards, and client requirements.
  • Preparing project QA documents such as PQP, NCR register, and ITPs.
  • Monitoring inspections and audits at subcontractors and project sites.
  • Identifying and following up on non-conformances and punch items.
  • Advising the project team on quality-related issues.
  • Reporting on quality KPIs and driving continuous improvement.
description_text:
As
Project Quality Manager
, you are responsible for all quality-related aspects within your project. You report to the Project Director and are part of the Project Management Team. You are the go-to person for quality matters for the project team, the client, and subcontractors.
Your responsibilities include:
Leading the project quality team and coordinating all QA/QC activities.
Ensuring compliance with Van Oord Management System, ISO standards, and client requirements.
Preparing project QA documents such as PQP, NCR register, and ITPs.
Monitoring inspections and audits at subcontractors and project sites.
Identifying and following up on non-conformances and punch items.
Advising the project team on quality-related issues.
Reporting on quality KPIs and driving continuous improvement.

title: Project HSE Coordinator
description_html:
As a Project HSE Coordinator at Van Oord you will work on different project locations (rotation) to make sure that all the safety policies are adhered by your colleagues. You are creative in coming up with solutions that are both efficient and safe.

Your role involves balancing between all the stakeholders, providing guidance and  maintaining a safety-first culture.

title: Internship – Master Data Management (MDM) at Van Oord
description_html:
Van Oord delivers complex marine and offshore projects all over the world. Behind these projects sits a large and growing amount of data. Master and reference data such as suppliers, countries, projects and rates are used every day to keep our operations running smoothly.

Within Data & Analytics, the IT Data Governance team is responsible for how this data is defined, structured and improved. As an intern, you support the further development of our Master Data Management processes. You focus on one or more master data domains and help bring structure and consistency to the way data is used across the organisation.

title: 2nd Cutter Engineer
description_html: As 2nd Engineer, you are responsible for the condition and maintenance of all technical installations on board our cutter vessels, Athena and Artemis. You will work in a 12-hour shift rotation and report to the Chief Engineer. Together you ensure all technical systems operate smoothly to support the success of our maritime projects.

You will work in a 12-hour shift rotation and report to the Chief Engineer. Together you ensure all technical systems operate smoothly to support the success of our maritime projects.

title: Senior Financial Accountant
description_html:
The Global Financial Shared Service Center (GFSSC), part of our Finance & Control department, provides centralized, efficient, and high-quality accounting and payroll services to all Van Oord Business Units, projects, and staff departments. 

With five specialized sub-teams operating from Rotterdam and Dubai, the GFSSC is constantly evolving. Enhancing our processes, strengthening collaboration, and supporting Van Oord’s global ambitions.

The Global Financial Shared Service Center (GFSSC), part of our Finance & Control department, provides centralized, efficient, and high-quality accounting and payroll services to all Van Oord Business Units, projects, and staff departments.
With five specialized sub-teams operating from Rotterdam and Dubai, the GFSSC is constantly evolving. Enhancing our processes, strengthening collaboration, and supporting Van Oord’s global ambitions.

title: Order to Cash Specialist
description_html:
The Global Financial Shared Service Center (GFSSC), part of our Finance & Control department, is at the core of our global operations. It provides efficient, consistent, and high-quality accounting and payroll services to all Van Oord Business Units, projects, and staff departments. 

Our GFSSC consists of five sub-teams working from Rotterdam and Dubai, each committed to delivering exceptional financial support. As our organisation continues to grow, so does our ambition to elevate and future-proof our shared services.

title: Quality Program Manager
description_html: As a Quality Program Manager, you play a key role in strengthening our integrated, ISO-based management system and driving our High Five for Quality programme. You work closely with teams across the organisation to ensure compliance, improve processes and embed a strong quality culture.
description_text:
As a Quality Program Manager, you play a key role in strengthening our integrated, ISO-based management system and driving our
High Five for Quality
programme. You work closely with teams across the organisation to ensure compliance, improve processes and embed a strong quality culture.

title: Tender Engineer Cables & Pipelines
description_html: Our Offshore Wind tenders are multidisciplinary and technically challenging. As Tender Engineer, you are the right hand of the Tender Manager. You help coordinate the tender team, collect input from technical experts and write clear, compelling proposals. You are involved from day one — from kick-off to final submission — and take ownership of tasks that contribute directly to winning projects. In high-level tenders you also step into planner responsibilities, creating strategic outlines that shape the bid.

You help coordinate the tender team, collect input from technical experts and write clear, compelling proposals. You are involved from day one — from kick-off to final submission — and take ownership of tasks that contribute directly to winning projects. In high-level tenders you also step into planner responsibilities, creating strategic outlines that shape the bid.

title: Management Assistant
description_html: With your sharp eye and proactive mindset, you make sure our teams can perform at their best, even under pressure. Thanks to you, travel runs smoothly, agendas stay clear and communication flows easily. You spot what people need and respond with speed and accuracy — making a meaningful difference every day.

title: Finance & Control Administrator
description_html: In this position, you will perform important accounting tasks independently and in coordination with the team. You will report to the Regional Finance Manager.
description_text: In this position, you will perform important accounting tasks independently and in coordination with the team. You will report to the Regional Finance Manager.

title: International Fiscal Affairs Specialist
description_html:
The international projects of our company result in a complex landscape of international personal tax compliance and payroll obligations. As a Global Mobility senior tax specialist, you will be responsible to help navigate our business and employees through this complexity. With respect to the Dutch tax matters, you will be the subject matter expert regarding the  wage tax, tax treaty, relevant tax base, payroll aspects and the application of the Dutch WKR.

You will be part of our Global Mobility team and will be working closely together with colleagues from Tax, Finance, and Payroll as well as external advisors to ensure full compliance. Your position will be in the head office located in Rotterdam.
description_text:

With respect to the Dutch tax matters, you will be the subject matter expert regarding the  wage tax, tax treaty, relevant tax base, payroll aspects and the application of the Dutch WKR.
You will be part of our Global Mobility team and will be working closely together with colleagues from Tax, Finance, and Payroll as well as external advisors to ensure full compliance. Your position will be in the head office located in Rotterdam.

title: Project Manager WOUW Rijntakken
description_html:
In this role, you will lead an integrated lot team in which colleagues from Van Oord Asset Management, Rebel Group and Rijkswaterstaat work together as one team. There is no traditional client - contractor relationship, but rather shared responsibility for results, budget and societal value.


WOUW focuses on the sustainable and efficient maintenance of the floodplains along the major rivers. The task is both clear and complex: safe and natural floodplains for everyone, within a fixed budget and with room for learning, optimisation and innovation.
description_text:
In this role, you will lead an integrated lot team in which colleagues from Van Oord Asset Management, Rebel Group and Rijkswaterstaat work together as one team. There is no traditional client - contractor relationship, but rather shared responsibility for results, budget and societal value.
WOUW focuses on the sustainable and efficient maintenance of the floodplains along the major rivers. The task is both clear and complex: safe and natural floodplains for everyone, within a fixed budget and with room for learning, optimisation and innovation.

title: Tender Manager Capital
description_html: As Tender Manager Capital, you will play a central role within the Product Line Capital of Van Oord. This division is built on decades of experience in international dredging projects — from waterway deepening and port extensions to land reclamation works. These are essential projects that shape the world of tomorrow. With our rich heritage and proven track record, Van Oord is a key player in the global market. You are responsible for developing your team into the best tender team in the market and ensuring that we submit winning, value-driven proposals.

You are responsible for developing your team into the best tender team in the market and ensuring that we submit winning, value-driven proposals.

You work in a 12-hour rotation and report to the Chief Engineer to maintain and optimize the technical systems on board.

You work in a 12-hour rotation and report to the Chief Engineer to maintain and optimize the technical systems on board.

title: 2nd Officer Cutter Dredger
description_html: As 2nd Officer on board one of our cutter dredgers, you are an essential part of the team that keeps operations running safely and efficiently. You support the 1st Officer in all aspects of dredging operations and lead by example on deck. Your responsibilities are diverse and hands-on, requiring technical skill, teamwork and clear communication. This is a role for someone who thrives on the water, enjoys responsibility and wants to grow within an international maritime environment. You will experience the direct results of your work on some of the world’s most impactful projects.
description_text: As 2nd Officer on board one of our cutter dredgers, you are an essential part of the team that keeps operations running safely and efficiently. You support the 1st Officer in all aspects of dredging operations and lead by example on deck. Your responsibilities are diverse and hands-on, requiring technical skill, teamwork and clear communication. This is a role for someone who thrives on the water, enjoys responsibility and wants to grow within an international maritime environment. You will experience the direct results of your work on some of the world’s most impactful projects.

title: Ships Electronical Engineer Hopper Dredger
description_html: For our sea-going fleet, we are looking for a Ships Electronical Engineer to work on a 5-weeks on/off rotation. You will be working on one of our modern dredging vessels. You will encounter a wide range of electrical and automation systems to keep you challenged. Working closely with the Chief Engineer, you will maintain and optimize the electrical systems on board, ensuring that the ship’s administration related to the electrical systems is up to date and compliant with Van Oord standards, such as the ship's logbook and daily reports.
description_text: For our sea-going fleet, we are looking for a Ships Electronical Engineer to work on a 5-weeks on/off rotation. You will be working on one of our modern dredging vessels. You will encounter a wide range of electrical and automation systems to keep you challenged. Working closely with the Chief Engineer, you will maintain and optimize the electrical systems on board, ensuring that the ship’s administration related to the electrical systems is up to date and compliant with Van Oord standards, such as the ship's logbook and daily reports.

title: Quality Specialist
description_html:
As Quality Specialist within Van Oord you’ll be in the lead for further professionalising our Business Unit Dredging and Infra quality organisation and support for tenders and projects. You’ll be looking after tender quality requirements, risks and opportunities. Upon project award you’ll be working together with project teams and project quality personnel (remote and on location) to setup and maintain the quality systems.  

We expect you to maintain the overview of quality performance of each project and share the insights in trends and focus areas for improvement with Business Unit Dredging & Infra and QHSE management.
description_text:

We expect you to maintain the overview of quality performance of each project and share the insights in trends and focus areas for improvement with Business Unit Dredging & Infra and QHSE management.

title: Master Multicat 3000 GT
description_html: As Multicatmaster, you are responsible for managing all onboard operations from nautical decisions to technical maintenance, from crew leadership to contact with local authorities. Every safe and successful manoeuvre reflects your leadership. Every shift in the water begins with your command.
description_text: As Multicatmaster, you are responsible for managing all onboard operations from nautical decisions to technical maintenance, from crew leadership to contact with local authorities. Every safe and successful manoeuvre reflects your leadership. Every shift in the water begins with your command.

title: Offshore Crane Operator
description_html: As an Offshore Crane Operator, you will be responsible for the safe and effective operation of cranes on various offshore projects worldwide. Your tasks will include lifting operations on platforms, pontoons, and ships, drafting lifting plans, and performing maintenance and repairs on cranes. You will work closely with the deck crew and actively contribute to a safe and orderly work environment.
description_text: As an Offshore Crane Operator, you will be responsible for the safe and effective operation of cranes on various offshore projects worldwide. Your tasks will include lifting operations on platforms, pontoons, and ships, drafting lifting plans, and performing maintenance and repairs on cranes. You will work closely with the deck crew and actively contribute to a safe and orderly work environment.

title: IT Infrastructure Designer
description_html:
Van Oord is an ambitious entrepreneurial organization. ‘We create’, ‘We care’, ‘We work together’ and ‘We succeed’ are our company values. As the Infra/Cloud Solution Designer you will play an important role in our purpose: “To create a better world for future generations by delivering Marine Ingenuity”. 

Located in Rotterdam, our information technology department supports our global organisation in successfully executing our projects by delivering shared & enabling platform capabilities, landscape planning, and ensuring continuity & cybersecurity of our services. We apply a pragmatic approach, keeping close relationships with business stakeholders to make sure we deliver what our customers need in a language that is familiar and understood. 

Our business landscape is undergoing significant transformation in key areas of finance, supply chain, procurement, HR, fleet- and asset management. Major goals to achieve are increased operational excellence, becoming fully data driven, and growing our digital capabilities around our processes and company ecosystem.  

We are transforming our IT landscape to become mostly platform- and cloud-based, in support of data and/or digital initiatives – with new platforms being realized for data, integration and low-code. We are transforming our way of working to become more Agile and adopt a product centric mindset. We are proud of our knowledgeable and experienced IT staff, applying a no-nonsense approach when needed. There is never a boring moment - with lots of challenges & innovations, in a world where ‘constant change’ is the only constant.

title: Commercial Manager
description_html: As Commercial Manager within our Dredging & Infra business unit, you play a pivotal role in driving our strategic commercial agenda. You analyse global and regional market trends, identify opportunities and shape proposals that align with our long-term goals. You oversee tenders from prequalification to contract signing, balancing risk and reward while maximising value. You also ensure legal, regulatory and quality requirements are met in every deal.
description_text: As Commercial Manager within our Dredging & Infra business unit, you play a pivotal role in driving our strategic commercial agenda. You analyse global and regional market trends, identify opportunities and shape proposals that align with our long-term goals. You oversee tenders from prequalification to contract signing, balancing risk and reward while maximising value. You also ensure legal, regulatory and quality requirements are met in every deal.

title: HR Business Partner Finance & Control
description_html:
As HR Business Partner for our Finance & Control (F&C) and Treasury department, you play a key role in shaping the organization for the future. Your focus will be on guiding change, supporting team development and strengthening HR foundations. You have the opportunity to take on exciting projects to build up the technical expertise in Van Oord.

You are a full member of the Finance & Control and Treasury management team and works, act as the business partner for mid-senior managers and communicates with mid-senior management. In this role you are involved in tactical decision-making, support the HR Director, and ensure that people and business priorities align. You functionally report to the HR Director OFE & Supporting Functions and are supported by an HR Advisor and HR Services, but you hold end-to-end responsibility for smooth HR administration within your scope. Furthermore you will hold an hierarchical reporting line to the Group Controller

Your success lies in collaborating with the HR Director, managers and team leads, the HR CoE and HR Operations. You will partner with the respective teams to influence the people and talent agenda to drive business outcomes and goals.

title: Pool Manager Dredging & Infra
description_html:
As a Pool Manager within the Dredging & Infra business unit, you act as the bridge between project needs and talent capabilities. You connect the Business Unit, ongoing projects, and Pool staff to ensure the right people are at the right place at the right time. You balance operational priorities with a people-first mindset, using your experience to make decisions that reflect Van Oord’s values and long-term vision.

You maintain a full overview of all skills and competencies within your pool and across Operations, ensuring that every staffing choice supports project excellence and growth. You are the conversational partner for your pool when it comes to development, issues and other important topics.

title: 2nd Engineer TSHD
description_html: As 2nd Engineer, you are responsible for the condition and maintenance of all technical installations on board our dredging vessels, including the HAM 318, Vox Amalia and Utrecht. You work in a 12-hour rotation and report directly to the Chief Engineer. Together, you ensure all technical systems operate smoothly to support the success of our maritime projects.
description_text: As 2nd Engineer, you are responsible for the condition and maintenance of all technical installations on board our dredging vessels, including the HAM 318, Vox Amalia and Utrecht. You work in a 12-hour rotation and report directly to the Chief Engineer. Together, you ensure all technical systems operate smoothly to support the success of our maritime projects.

title: 2nd Engineer Jack Ups
description_html: As a 2nd Engineer Jack Ups, you will be a key player in the maintenance and operation of our cutting-edge jack-up vessels. These vessels are integral to our offshore wind farm installations, dredging, and other marine projects. You will ensure the technical equipment and systems on board are in optimal working condition, allowing the team to carry out their tasks efficiently and safely.
description_text: As a 2nd Engineer Jack Ups, you will be a key player in the maintenance and operation of our cutting-edge jack-up vessels. These vessels are integral to our offshore wind farm installations, dredging, and other marine projects. You will ensure the technical equipment and systems on board are in optimal working condition, allowing the team to carry out their tasks efficiently and safely.

title: 2nd Engineer Water Injection Dredgers (< 500 GT)
description_html: Water injection dredging fluidizes the seabed which makes it possible to move sediment in a controlled and efficient way. As Second Engineer you take responsibility for the technical heart of these highly automated vessels. You work worldwide with support from our shore based expertise centres. You follow the rhythm of the vessel and you keep our dredging and propulsion systems in top condition. You help identify system issues and improve performance which contributes directly to our global projects.

As Second Engineer you take responsibility for the technical heart of these highly automated vessels. You work worldwide with support from our shore based expertise centres. You follow the rhythm of the vessel and you keep our dredging and propulsion systems in top condition. You help identify system issues and improve performance which contributes directly to our global projects.

title: 2nd Officer Jack Ups
description_html: As a 2nd Officer on board a Jack-Up vessel, you are responsible for safely navigating the ship and supporting marine and offshore operations.
description_text: As a 2nd Officer on board a Jack-Up vessel, you are responsible for safely navigating the ship and supporting marine and offshore operations.

title: 2nd Engineer
description_html: As 2nd Engineer in our Ship Management Department, you’ll join our international fleet and will work on a 12-hours rotation schedule. Working closely with the Chief Engineer, you’ll manage and optimise the ship's technical systems. If assigned as Day Engineer, you take the lead in planning and executing maintenance projects on board.
description_text: As 2nd Engineer in our Ship Management Department, you’ll join our international fleet and will work on a 12-hours rotation schedule. Working closely with the Chief Engineer, you’ll manage and optimise the ship's technical systems. If assigned as Day Engineer, you take the lead in planning and executing maintenance projects on board.

title: Allround Ships Electronical Engineer
description_html: For our sea-going fleet, we are looking for a Ships Electronical Engineer to work on a 5-weeks on/off rotation. You will be working on one of our modern vessels, such as a hopper dredger, cutter dredger, cable laying vessel, fall pipe vessel, or a jack-up wind installation vessel. You will encounter a wide range of electrical and automation systems to keep you challenged. Working closely with the Chief Engineer, you will maintain and optimize the electrical systems on board, ensuring that the ship’s administration related to the electrical systems is up to date and compliant with Van Oord standards, such as the ship's logbook and daily reports.
description_text: For our sea-going fleet, we are looking for a Ships Electronical Engineer to work on a 5-weeks on/off rotation. You will be working on one of our modern vessels, such as a hopper dredger, cutter dredger, cable laying vessel, fall pipe vessel, or a jack-up wind installation vessel. You will encounter a wide range of electrical and automation systems to keep you challenged. Working closely with the Chief Engineer, you will maintain and optimize the electrical systems on board, ensuring that the ship’s administration related to the electrical systems is up to date and compliant with Van Oord standards, such as the ship's logbook and daily reports.

title: Calculator
description_html: In this role, you’ll deliver accurate cost estimates and price proposals for some of the most complex dredging projects in the Netherlands. Together with colleagues in engineering, procurement and project management, you’ll build strong, realistic foundations for tenders. You’ll dive into project documentation, analyse risks and find the most favourable options in terms of cost, time and feasibility — with a clear eye for quality and deadlines.
description_text: In this role, you’ll deliver accurate cost estimates and price proposals for some of the most complex dredging projects in the Netherlands. Together with colleagues in engineering, procurement and project management, you’ll build strong, realistic foundations for tenders. You’ll dive into project documentation, analyse risks and find the most favourable options in terms of cost, time and feasibility — with a clear eye for quality and deadlines.

title: 2nd Backhoe Engineer
description_html: As a 2nd Engineer Backhoe Dredger, you will play a key role in the maintenance and operation of our advanced dredging vessels, specifically the backhoe dredgers. These vessels are essential for our dredging and marine projects, such as the construction of harbors, canals, and offshore wind farms. You will ensure that the technical equipment and systems on board are in optimal working condition, allowing the team to perform their tasks efficiently and safely.
description_text: As a 2nd Engineer Backhoe Dredger, you will play a key role in the maintenance and operation of our advanced dredging vessels, specifically the backhoe dredgers. These vessels are essential for our dredging and marine projects, such as the construction of harbors, canals, and offshore wind farms. You will ensure that the technical equipment and systems on board are in optimal working condition, allowing the team to perform their tasks efficiently and safely.

title: Project Engineer
description_html: In the role of Project Engineer / Estimator, you are responsible for performing preparatory tasks and cost estimations for tenders related to the activities of Van Oord Grondstoffen B.V. You support and participate in tender teams by providing advice on the logistical possibilities concerning the extraction, waterborne transport, and transshipment of raw materials. Through field explorations and supervision of our existing sand pit operations and unloading at storage sites, you will gain extensive knowledge and affinity with the work of Van Oord Grondstoffen B.V. The combination of theoretical and practical knowledge strengthens the quality of your advice.

title: Vessel Solution Architect
description_html:
At Van Oord, we are an ambitious and entrepreneurial organization with core values: We create, We care, We work together, and We succeed. As a Vessel Solution Architect, you will contribute to our purpose:

“To create a better world for future generations by delivering Marine Ingenuity”. 

Based in Rotterdam, you will support a diverse fleet of vessels, each with unique characteristics. Our vessel landscape is undergoing a major transformation, driven by:

  • New cybersecurity legislation (E26 & E27)
  • The need for enhanced operational excellence
  • Becoming a fully data-driven organization
  • Expanding our digital capabilities


While we are transitioning our headquarters' IT landscape to a platform- and cloud-based environment, our vessels remain floating hubs that require continuous improvement in security, standards, and communication technologies (LEO). Your mission is to bridge the gap between onshore and offshore environments.

New cybersecurity legislation (E26 & E27)
The need for enhanced operational excellence

Expanding our digital capabilities
While we are transitioning our headquarters' IT landscape to a platform- and cloud-based environment, our vessels remain floating hubs that require continuous improvement in security, standards, and communication technologies (LEO). Your mission is to bridge the gap between onshore and offshore environments.

title: Offshore Construction Manager Wind
description_html: In this role, you lead, coach and motivate your offshore construction team from preparation to successful execution. You are ultimately responsible for safe, efficient and timely operations that meet the highest standards in the offshore wind industry. Working closely with project management, QHSE, vessel teams and clients, you ensure collaboration, control and performance throughout the entire installation process.
description_text: In this role, you lead, coach and motivate your offshore construction team from preparation to successful execution. You are ultimately responsible for safe, efficient and timely operations that meet the highest standards in the offshore wind industry. Working closely with project management, QHSE, vessel teams and clients, you ensure collaboration, control and performance throughout the entire installation process.

title: Superintendent Offshore Wind
description_html: As Superintendent, you will be responsible for the preparation and execution of offshore installation projects worldwide. You’ll ensure that every operation meets the highest safety and quality standards while aligning with project-specific requirements. Working within Van Oord Offshore Wind means being part of an innovative, dedicated and collaborative organisation that shapes the future of renewable energy.
description_text: As Superintendent, you will be responsible for the preparation and execution of offshore installation projects worldwide. You’ll ensure that every operation meets the highest safety and quality standards while aligning with project-specific requirements. Working within Van Oord Offshore Wind means being part of an innovative, dedicated and collaborative organisation that shapes the future of renewable energy.

title: Lifting Supervisor Offshore Wind
description_html: As Lifting Supervisor, you are responsible for managing all onshore and offshore lifting operations for foundations and turbine installation. From reviewing lift plans and risk assessments to coordinating crane operations on site, you’ll make sure every lift is prepared and performed safely and efficiently. You’ll collaborate with a team of skilled offshore professionals and support our mission to accelerate the energy transition through innovative offshore wind projects across the globe.
description_text: As Lifting Supervisor, you are responsible for managing all onshore and offshore lifting operations for foundations and turbine installation. From reviewing lift plans and risk assessments to coordinating crane operations on site, you’ll make sure every lift is prepared and performed safely and efficiently. You’ll collaborate with a team of skilled offshore professionals and support our mission to accelerate the energy transition through innovative offshore wind projects across the globe.
